name: rspec-puppet
description: RSpec tests for your Puppet manifests.

plugins.name: rspec-puppet-augeas
plugins.description: RSpec tests for Augeas resources inside Puppet manifests.

plugins.name: rspec-puppet-utils
plugins.description: Helper classes for mock/stub functions, templates and hierdata.

plugins.name: rspec-puppet-facts
plugins.description: Simplify your unit tests by looping on every supported Operating System and populating facts.

plugins.name: simp-rspec-puppet-facts
plugins.description: Shim that injects SIMP-related facts into rspec-puppet-facts.
